title: I'm getting a infinity league install as of patch 7.2
body:
So I booted up league to play the new ww and it said I didnt have enough memory on my drive. So I delete some stuff and and I then move league to my second driver and reinstall the game(All 12.7 gigabytes of league) Then I unnsinstall league and reinstall it. I then get the standard 2 gigabyte update and halfway through it says unspecified error. I retry again and it's a 5 gigabyte patch download. I start download the patch again and it says unspecified error and I retry. It then says I have a 6 gigabyte patch to download and now my second driver went from having 16 gigs of space to have 3 MB of free space.
Help is required.

replies.body: I have the same error and it stops at 33% with 64 files scanned

It's my 4th time patching this damn game. Repaired 3 times still can't enter the game. It bugs on 33% and others, there are more people with this error. We just have to wait for a solution from Riot, never happened to me before. :/

At 33% your patcher is done scanning your game files and is ready to download the patch.  Repairing will not do anything in this case because the issue is a block in your connection reaching our patching servers and not your game files.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  I hope that helps!

There are a lot of reinstalls happening, so it's really important to take a step back for a minute and resolve the initial cause of this.  The unspecified error can occur for a few reasons like connection trouble or permissions.  We can get a better idea of your specific issue by knowing at what % you're getting the error.  Make sure you have enough space, slow down on the reinstalls, and let me know!

Same Here , Unspecified Error Occurred , i get that 5 times by now , i tried hextech repair tool for the repatch option , repatched 2 gb for the 1/2 first sequence and the 2nd one , after that at the "Calculating Differences / Files Scanned at 100 or smthing either on 50 the error ocurrs .
